subproject.corporate outcome: National and local government entities and elected bodies have strengthened institutional capacities enabling them to deliver effective economic and social policies that promote human development and manage the public services that citizens expect
subproject.description:
The purpose of the programme is sustainable local development and the specific development objective of the Programme is to support the development of high quality governance institutions at the level of local self-government for further improvement of the quality of services provided at the local level. 

Interventions are organised according to five Programme components: 1) Support to Improvement of Legal and Policy Framework for Self-governance through Provision of International Expertise; 2) Institution and Capacity Building; 3) Participatory Local Development Planning; 4) Social Mobilization and Partnerships for quality service delivery; 5) Scaling up through Advocacy and Communication.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Local self-governance
